questions.response: Bruce J. Clark is the CEO of New Clients Inc with over 30 years of experience helping CPAs buy and sell practices. He's a 5th Degree Black Belt Karate Master and author of multiple books on practice sales. His core values are honesty, integrity, and responsiveness - he says what he means and means what he says.
New Clients Inc has been in business for over 30 years, since the early 1990s. Bruce has helped hundreds of accountants and CPAs successfully buy and sell practices during that time.
You can reach Bruce directly at 856-304-1035. He's very responsive and personally handles all client relationships. You can also book an appointment directly through our calendar system.
